title: ADB Loan to Help Upgrade Provincial Highway Network in Sindh (ADB - Asian Development Bank) ...
text: ( Source : ADB - Asian Development Bank ) ISLAMABAD, PAKISTAN - The Asian Development Bank (ADB) has approved a loan of over $197 million to rehabilitate 328 kilometers (km) of provincial highways and assist authorities in developing a master
